title: Poster, Emigre Graphics:  Dead History, 1994
creditline: Gift of Rudy VanderLans and Zuzana Licko
description: Promotional poster for new type called "Dead History" from Emigre Graphics.  Black and white studio photograph of closed book and white note pad on dark fabric with computer added tones of blue. Imprinted on book, "THE MORE WE LEARN THE LESS WE/ HISTORY"  White underline separates and overlaps text for partial view. Superimposed on book, all underlined: "Dead History bold and roman"(in white)/ is a typeface designed by P. Scott Makela/ available exclusively from Enigre Fonts." (in orange). These three lines repeated three more times, consecutively in various fonts. Color photograph of top half of woman's head with closed eyes and dark brown hair with old man's hand on top of her head as though she is being benedicted by minister at bottom.  Black and white photograph of blossomed rose placed above man's hand.  Color photograph of fonts in such as "A", H", "Y" made from wood into 3 dimensional objects along right side.  Only bottom half visible.  Imprinted in off-white and blue, overlapping photograph of book and note pad: "DEAD/ HISTORY" with " ... UO 2" in orange, inbetween.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, Emigre Graphics:  Dead History, 1994. offset lithography on uncoated stock. Gift of Rudy VanderLans and Zuzana Licko. 1995-65-10.
